database.title: DHCP Server Leases
database.p: A database with this schema holds the leases information of the DHCP server.
database.table:
List of the leases information of DHCP server. Number of records correspond to the number of DHCP clients or hosts that got assigned the IP address by the DHCP server.
Specifies the expiry time of the DHCP lease entry in epoch format. The epoch format time is stored as a string.
Specifies the MAC address of the DHCP client to which IP address is assigned by DHCP server.
Specifies the IPv4/IPv6 address that got assigned to the DHCP host.
Specifies the hostname of the DHCP client/host. This is optional.
Specifies the client id of the DHCP client/host. This is optional.
